a8c98e35-bda7-4911-9dd2-cb0f3e6c8403.name: 战斗反射
a8c98e35-bda7-4911-9dd2-cb0f3e6c8403.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

b43d0686-883a-4335-b5d0-0eab09454701.name: 增强招架（@近战武器技能@）

54a45541-b7f9-4618-8284-594ea3013fb2.name: 健康
54a45541-b7f9-4618-8284-594ea3013fb2.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

b1c275b9-96cb-46f7-9ec9-900e67e419d4.name: Fit, Very
b1c275b9-96cb-46f7-9ec9-900e67e419d4.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

09e38eda-6828-4ae7-a3a7-ec8f2e74ceca.name: 高痛阈
09e38eda-6828-4ae7-a3a7-ec8f2e74ceca.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

0b24af4c-f96a-48a8-893b-80e792d4d9d3.name: 可选增益
0b24af4c-f96a-48a8-893b-80e792d4d9d3.notes: 在天赋对应的技能检定失败后的避免遭受伤害的 HT 检定上获得加值

54997652-464d-4927-8e57-1527219b28f8.name: 易于命中
54997652-464d-4927-8e57-1527219b28f8.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

a38c6955-ebf5-43b8-933b-666348192d35.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

d1e16d60-633e-4fab-85b2-775ed530f573.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

23945823-24ec-4fb2-bb78-5cac0d939bdc.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

fea4ef90-2620-456f-8c25-2685a270358d.name: 标志性装备
fea4ef90-2620-456f-8c25-2685a270358d.notes: Gear is worth (starting wealth)/10 per level

1ab9e242-f2d8-448b-bb5b-3bf69b931258.name: Weapon Bond
1ab9e242-f2d8-448b-bb5b-3bf69b931258.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

6692acbd-3fd0-49bc-9999-143d99eb5412.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

6c5d43cc-8fe3-4672-b929-ebdf143270cd.name: 社会污名（少数群体）
6c5d43cc-8fe3-4672-b929-ebdf143270cd.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

50f278b8-0f7c-493a-8345-e668567368ad.name: Choose one of these three 16-point melee packages

da8eadeb-5893-49c4-81d1-7cb124ba8a10.name: Either 2 more choices at 4 points each or one more choice AND:

0b56291e-69f5-4b75-974a-3addd55f1a70.name: 1 point to raise one of these skills by a level; or 1 point to raise a primary unarmed skill or Knife by a level.
